name: A very sticky situation
description:
A very short puzzle game made for the 2021 GMTK game jam

As the little green slime, you have to push all blue slimes (and also yourself!) to the appropriate goal. But blue slimes will permanently stick to one another (or, join together wink wink), to your aid or determent .

Made in the puzzlescript engine since I suck at other engines.

Also made in just a few hours since I have a thesis to turn in (yes very smart to join a game jam while working on my thesis I know)
